import { Injectable } from '@angular/core';
import { MapsPageResponse, MapsPaginatorUsecase } from 'maps-angular-components';
import { [PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Repository } from '../repository/[PREFIX-KABEBCASE].repository';
import { Observable } from 'rxjs';
import { [PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Filter, [PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Response } from '../entities/[PREFIX-KABEBCASE]-resquest-response.entity';

@Injectable({
  providedIn: 'root'
})

export class [PREFIX-CAMELCASE]ListUsecase extends MapsPaginatorUsecase<[PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Filter, [PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Response> {
  constructor(private readonly _repository: [PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Repository) {
    super();
  }

  protected action = (busca: string): Observable<MapsPageResponse<[PREFIX-CAMELCASE]Response>> => {
    return this._repository.list(busca);
  };
}
